poem:
### Exported Waves

China casts its net wide,  
a trillion-dollar sea  
of exported dreams.  
The world leans on it,  
as it leans on the world—  
a double-edged dance.  
Behind the headset glints,  
an invisible thread ties  
the buyer to the maker,  
both whispering to the wind  
of change, yet unheard.
